content.raw:
Good catch! This is an outdated implementation from before the `Identity` class existed. Because of the weirdness of templates, this code won’t get compiled until the function gets used; that’s the only reason the compiler allowed it.

In [4d7d2e7](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-physics/commits/4d7d2e7e19836ca748d97553a55f338664174d36?at=default) it’s been updated, and I added a test for each function. By having a test use each function, the functions get compiled, and we’ll see any compilation errors that might be in them.
content.html:
Good catch! This is an outdated implementation from before the Identity class existed. Because of the weirdness of templates, this code won’t get compiled until the function gets used; that’s the only reason the compiler allowed it.

In 4d7d2e7 it’s been updated, and I added a test for each function. By having a test use each function, the functions get compiled, and we’ll see any compilation errors that might be in them.
